10 Most Googled Celebrities In 2018 By Indians And Why They Became An Internet Sensation

Doing something awesome? Have a story that may inspire people for good and spread happiness? Share your story with us.

These celebrities have dominated the 2018 list by Google trends for India but the reason that made them most searched personalities are good, bad and ugly. While you wonder who has done what and do not follow news religiously, here is the list of 10 most searched celebrities in India as per Google.

Wondering what are the top 10 songs Indians Googled in 2018? Find out are.

1. Priya Prakash Varrier

The Kerala college student who is now an actress won India’s heart with a wink, which made her an overnight sensation. She garnered more Instagram followers even before her first film hit the theatres, and have even more followers than Mark Zuckerberg on Instagram.

2. Nick Jonas

The American singer and actor caught attention when he and Priyanka Chopra appeared together at the Met Gala in 2017. And the rest, you know already.

3. Sapna Choudhary

This Haryanvi dancer is known for her energetic thumkas and recently a video went viral which made her one of the top 10 searched personalities in 2018.

4. Priyanka Chopra

Miss World 2000 and a popular Bollywood actor, Priyanka Chopra came under the spotlight for her relationship with Nick Jonas and the wedding was no less than a fairy tale.

5. Anand Ahuja

Bollywood actor Sonam Kapoor’s husband is the owner of Bhane and co-founder of Veg Non Veg, a multi-brand sneaker store in India. He went to Wharton to pursue MBA but didn’t complete it.

6. Sara Ali Khan

This beautiful actress is the daughter of Amrita Singh and Saif Ali Khan and made her Bollywood debut with Kedarnath.

7. Salman Khan

During the shooting of the film ‘Hum Saath Saath Hain,’ on the night of October 1, 1998, this Bollywood star was accused of killing two blackbucks, an endangered species, in the Kankani village near Jodhpur and the verdict took over google trends this year.

8. Meghan Markle

A screen actress who appeared in a number of TV series before landing a recurring role of Rachel Zane on the USA Network show “Suits”. Meghan Markle, her Royal Highness the Duchess of Sussex, married Prince Harry in 2018 at St. George’s Chapel at Windsor Castle which made her one of the most googled women of the year.

9. Anup Jalota

This Big Boss 12 (a reality show) contestant made headlines when he was linked up with his student’ Jasleen Matharu but later claimed that it was all cooked up by the show’s producers.

10. Boney Kapoor

Veteran Bollywood producer and legendary Sridevi’s husband. Sridevi was draped in tricolor and was cremated with state honors. While there was debate around the actor’s death, it made Bonkey Kapoor one of the most searched personalities in 2018.

Doing something awesome? Have a story that may inspire people for good and spread happiness? Share your story with us. Loved this story? Connect with us on Facebook and Twitter for more stories.
